title: How do I connect a Bluetooth headset?
answer:
Ensure that the Bluetooth headset is discoverable. Go to Settings and select the Bluetooth switch to enable Bluetooth. Your phone will automatically search for Bluetooth devices nearby. 

 In the list of Bluetooth devices found, select the Bluetooth headset you wish to connect to and follow the on-screen prompts to connect. 

 You can also refer to the instruction manual for the Bluetooth headset.[![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=97264)]()
